name: Chef’s Fruit Blast
description:
Giant fruits are coming! Can you survive? Escape from giant bouncing fruits, slash and blast them with knifes when they are up in the air. Prove your skills, reach new levels fast!

Your kitchen is under attack from giant fruits for no apparent reason. But no worries. The chef is here to save the day. He has bigger knives, faster moves and a softer beard.

Chef’s Fruit Blast is fun game to play, easy to progress but hard to become a pro.

Keep your finger on the screen to throw all sorts of knives, swipe left and right to escape.

Each level is a step towards a different adventure with even stronger fruits and sharper knives.
